text:
[Verse]
Under night skies we fly
Stars whisper and we try
Keep the rhythm feel the beat
In the light on our feet

[Verse]
Moonlight calls from above
We move close like a glove
Hands are held hearts ignite
Through the endless night

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Feels so right so bright
Every step every sway
Keeps the darkness away

[Verse]
Laughter echoes through air
In your eyes I find care
Twirl around spin again
Don't know where don't know when

[Bridge]
Our shadows long and free
Twist with you endlessly
No regrets just pure bliss
Moments sealed with a kiss

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Feels so right so bright
Every step every sway
Keeps the darkness away
title: Dancing In The Moonlight
